record.field: balance = _('NET_PROFIT2').balance budgeted = _('NET_PROFIT2').budgeted budget_v = budgeted and round((balance-budgeted) / budgeted, 2) or 0
balance = _('INC2').balance - _('COS2').balance budgeted = _('INC2').budgeted - _('COS2').budgeted budget_v = budgeted and round((balance-budgeted) / budgeted, 2) or 0
balance = sum.credit -sum.debit budgeted = sum.budgeted budget_v = budgeted and round((balance-budgeted) / budgeted, 2) or 0
balance = sum.debit - sum.credit budgeted = sum.budgeted budget_v = budgeted and round((balance-budgeted) / budgeted, 2) or 0
balance =_('GRP2').balance - _('GNRL_EX2').balance budgeted = _('GRP2').budgeted - _('GNRL_EX2').budgeted budget_v = budgeted and round((balance-budgeted) / budgeted, 2) or 0
balance = sum.debit - sum.credit budgeted = sum.budgeted budget_v = budgeted and round((balance-budgeted) / budgeted, 2) or 0

balance = _('P_OP2').balance + _('I_INV2').balance + _('O_INC2').balance budgeted = _('P_OP2').budgeted +_('I_INV2').budgeted - _('O_INC2').budgeted budget_v = budgeted and round((balance-budgeted) / budgeted, 2) or 0
balance = sum.credit - sum.debit budgeted = sum.budgeted budget_v = budgeted and round((balance-budgeted) / budgeted, 2) or 0
balance = sum.credit - sum.debit budgeted = sum.budgeted budget_v = budgeted and round((balance-budgeted) / budgeted, 2) or 0
balance = _('NET_B_TAX2').balance - _('TAX2').balance budgeted = _('NET_B_TAX2').budgeted- _('TAX2').budgeted budget_v = budgeted and round((balance-budgeted) / budgeted, 2) or 0
المتحصل من بيع ممتلكات و معدات
استبعاد استثمارات فى سندات حكوميه محليه
صافى التغير فى نقد و مافى حكمة
نقد و ما فى حكمه فى بداية الفتره
نقد و ما فى حكمه فى نهاية الفترة
